data.text: Me mma, muntie me, muntie agya nkyerɛkyerɛ;
Mema mo adesua a ɛkɔ anim,
Efisɛ na me nso, meyɛ mʼagya babarima,
Na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ me se,
Nya nyansa, nya ntease;
Nnyaw nyansa hɔ, na ɛbɛbɔ wo ho ban;
Nyansa boro biribiara so; enti hwehwɛ nyansa.
Di no ni na ɛbɛma wo so;
Ɔde nkonimdi nhwiren hankare begu wo ti so
Me ba, tie na fa nea meka no,
Mɛkyerɛ wo nyansa kwan so
Sɛ wonantew a, wʼanammɔntu bɛkɔ waa
Di nkyerɛkyerɛ so; na nnyaa mu,
Ntu wo nan nsi amumɔyɛfo kwan so
Kwati no, ntu kwan mfa so;
Efisɛ wɔnyɛɛ bɔne a wontumi nna;
Wodi amumɔyɛsɛm brodo,
Atreneefo kwan te sɛ adekyee hann a edi kan,
Nanso amumɔyɛfo kwan te sɛ sum kabii;
Me ba, yɛ aso ma nea meka;
Mma emfi wʼani so,
efisɛ, ɛyɛ nkwa ma wɔn a wohu
Ne nyinaa akyi, bɔ wo koma ho ban,
Mma oburu kasa mfi wʼano;
Hwɛ wʼanim tee,
Bɔ ɔkwan tamaa ma wʼanan
Mman mfa nifa anaa benkum;
